attributes.action: Replace the Road Fund License with information as to the vehicles legal status.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Abolish the road fund license and add the proportional duty previously raised to fuel. Replace the license disk with a similar disk showing valid MOT & vehicle insurance details.
Add to the issue of the certificate a minimum insurance premium to cover third party insurance in the event of an accident where the driver is uninsured.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
